1.content:
Five friends had came to legendary Island for adventure and new pokemon to catch. The five friends had been given an invitation to come to legendary Island. They had no idea who sent them the letter. Let's see who these lucky five trainers are.

Damon: A pokemon trainer who live in Shino along with his brother. Damon had beaten all the gyms and took on the ellite four and champion. He had won and became the new champion of Shino.

Zach: The younger brother of Damon. After hearing Damon won the Shino league. Zach had become jealous of his older brother and hopes of getting strong so he can beat Damon some day.

Jodi: A female trainer and long time friend of Damon. Jodi had a crush on Damon since they first met. She will do anything to win Damon's heart and his love for her.

Chris: A long time rival and friend of Damon and Zach. Chris went on a journey, with Damon and Zach, and have always think of himself as their friend and rival.

Steven: A friend of Zach ever since he decided to go on a journey of his own after he and Damon won their first badge. After that Zach met Steven in a pokemon battle and soon became friends.

A few minuets later. Damon, Zach, Jodi, Chris and Steven had made it to legendary Island. "Alright guy's let's split up and meet back here before sunset" said Damon.

"Let's see who can find and catch the most pokemon" said Zach. "I won't lose to you guy's" said Chris. "Me either" said Steven. "Damon are you sure we should split up? I would like to be with you" said Jodi.

"It will be fine Jodi. I'm sure you can handle yourself. Alright let's get moving" The five friends the split up. So who should we focus on the story first?
1.title: Heading to legendary Island.

11.content: Okay what legendary pokemon does Damon meet?
11.title: Damon

choices: Something goes wrong with the transformation.
111.content:
Keldeo had came to the Island along with Cobalion, Virizion and Terrakion. They have heard that five humans had enter their sacred ground and went to look for them.

Keldeo was told to be careful around humans. But he never met a human before and always wanted to meet one for a while now. He went on his own for a while.

As he look around the Island. Keldeo had spotted a human. It was Damon. "I found a human. So that's what they look like. I should approach him quietly"

Keldeo begins to sneak up on Damon. But he steps on something and get's Damon's attention. "Who's there? Is that you Zach? I hope nobody is trying to sneak up on me"

Keldeo then comes out of his hiding spot. "Hello human" said Keldeo. "A pokemon and it can talk. Who are you?" Damon ask. "I am Keldeo and I came here to this Island to find you and four other humans" Keldeo replied.

"Why are you here for me and my friends?" said Damon. "Because your on our Island. No human is allow on our sacred ground. However I never met a human before" said Keldeo.

"So you want us to leave the Island?" said Damon. "Cobalion does. But I don't know about myself. Maybe there is a way to keep you on this Island for a while" said Keldeo.

"You have a plan?" said Damon. "I can try and change you into a pokemon. But we legendary's were told not to turn humans into a pokemon unless we punish them" said Keldeo.

"Alright then. Try to change me into a pokemon then" said Damon. "Really?" Keldeo ask. "If it means staying on the Island go right ahead" said Damon.

"Alright I'm going to try to change you either into a water or fighting type. Those are the types I am. So I'm going to try to change you into one of my types"

Keldeo begins to concentrate his power and tries to change Damon. But into what type?
111.title: Damon and Keldeo.

11111.content: Keldeo changes Damon into the great legendary Kyogre!.... Wait a minute do it can move on the land?
11111.title: Legendary pokemon.

choices: One of his friends finds him
1111121.content:
First thing that happen to Damon was his hair as it change into his new long purple hair. His body then begins to grow blue fur.

His hands and feet then quickly changes into his new paws. Damon then felt a sudden shift, in his spine, as he fell on four legs and was lock in that form.

His face then changes into his new muzzle as his eyes changes to red. A crystal horn then grows out from his forehead.

Blue spots then appears on his body. Two white tails then grows out from his behind finishing his changes. When it was over. Damon was now a Suicune.

Keldeo was now done changing Damon and looks over his new body. He then realize what he has done and was surprise.

"Oh no. What have I done?" Damon looks over his new form and recognize the pokemon he was change into. "Hey I'm a Suicune now"

Damon felt very happy. Suicune was one of his favorite legendary pokemon. "No no. Your not suppose to be a Suicune. I was only going to change you into a standerd water type pokemon like a Totodile or a Squritle" said Keldeo.

"So why am I a Suicune then?" Damon ask. "I must have use too much of my power on you. Cobalion might help us. Wait here and I'll go get him"

Keldeo then runs off. But Damon didn't want to wait. He wanted to try out his new form and show it off to his friends. "I could get use to this"

Damon then tries out his new form out.
1111121.title: Yes

1111122.content: Does Keldeo change you into a Lugia?
1111122.title: No

choices: One of his friends finds him

Damon's body started to grow silver feathers. He the begins to grow taller as his clothes starts to rip and tear. Damon looks over his new body.

"Keldeo what's happing to me?" He ask as his hands change into his new wings. Keldeo was also surprise by this as well.

"I I don't know. I must have use too much of my power on you" He then felt his neck growing longer as blue mask surrounds his eyes.

His feet then change into a three toed feet. His face then changes to look more like a Lugia's. Blue flaps then appears on his back.

Lastly a tail, with blue spikes, then comes out from his behind. A few changes later and Damon had been change into the legendary pokemon Lugia.

Damon looks over his new body and looks at Keldeo. He was now much bigger then him. "Keldeo you have change me into a Lugia" said Damon.

"I didn't mean too. I only tried to change you into a normal water type pokemon" said Keldeo. "What am I going to do now?" Damon ask.

"Stay here. I'll go get my friends" Keldeo then left. Damon looks around and see almost the whole Island. He looks at his new wings and flaps them. It felt good.

He look at his new tail and move it. It felt good as well. "Maybe this won't be bad at all" said Damon

Damon's body begins to grow cream color fur. His face then changes into his new snout, Damon then felt his hands and feet ball up as they change into his new round blue hoves.

A Cream shape horn then pop's out of his forehead. His hair color then changes red as it changes into his new mane. Damon then finds himself on four legs as he shrinks to Keldeo's size.

Blue ridges then appear on his body. Damon felt something coming out of his butt as a aqua like tail came out. A few changes later and Damon was a Keldeo in ordinary form.

Damon takes a look at his body and then looks at Keldeo. Keldeo seem happy after his first changing a human into a pokemon. "I did it. I change a human into a pokemon successfully" said Keldeo.

"I look like you" said Damon. "That was the point. I'm my only kind. I always wanted another Keldeo either as a friend or a brother. What do you say Damon? Would you like to be my brother?" Keldeo ask.

"I have a brother already. But it would be cool to have a pokemon brother as well" said Damon. "Thank you Damon. Wait until the sword of justice hear about this" said Keldeo.

Keldeo then stop. "What's the matter?" Damon ask. "Oh no. The sword of justice can't find out about this. If they learn I change a human into a pokemon. I'll be in trouble" said Keldeo.

"Then let's not tell them then. Let's keep it as our little secret" said Damon. "Great idea bro" said Keldeo. "Glad I thought of it bro" said Damon.

111311.content:
Keldeo begins to use his power to change Damon into a pokemon. But he wasn't good enough to use it yet. The swords of justice had been training him. But he still had a long way to go.

Damon begins to notice that something was wrong with the transformation when his body starts to look like a egg shell. "Um Keldeo you should stop. I think there's something wrong here" said Damon.

Keldeo didn't listen. "It's alright. I got this" Damon then starts to shrink as he begins to get younger and younger until he was at a baby's age while Keldeo continue to change him.

He didn't notice Damon's transformation. In a few minuets. Keldeo was done. "There all done" He was shock to see Damon as a Togepi. Keldeo goes up to Damon.

"Oh no. What have I done?" said Keldeo. Not only did Keldeo change him into a baby pokemon. But he also gave Damon a mind of a baby pokemon as well.

Damon's stomach starts to rumble as he almost begins to cry. Keldeo notice and starts to panic. "Oh don't cry please. Are you hungry? I'll get you something to eat"

He starts to look around and found an apple hanging on a tree. "There. That should do just fine" He then kicks the tree and the apple fell. Keldeo then gives it to Damon.

Damon cheer up and ate the apple. Keldeo sigh. "I mess up this time. I change a human into a baby pokemon. Cobalion won't like this. What am I going to do now?"

Keldeo then realize Damon had fallen asleep after eating. "Well at least he's asleep. This is all my fault now. I have to fix this. I know. Maybe lord Arceus can help me. But I can't leave Damon behind like this"

Keldeo then picks Damon up, with a little difficulty, and place him on his back. "Not a safe place to put a baby pokemon. But I have to do something to fix this mess"

Keldeo walks slowly and tries his best to not let Damon fall. "I have to get to the hall of Origin. Lord Arceus should be there. He should have the answers I need to reverse the changes I did to a human. I hope he forgives me for changing an innocent human into a pokemon" said Keldeo.

Damona just smile. "It's alright Keldeo. Being a Blissey might be fun. If I wanted too. I could work at a pokemon center and become a pokemon nurse" said Damona.

"Then let's not tell them. You can just tell them you met me as a Blissey who's helping me to get to a pokemon center so I can work there. It might be fun being a pokemon nurse" said Damona.

"Do you think it will work?" Keldeo ask. "We have to least try Keldeo" said Damona. "Then I'm with you then Damona" said Keldeo. "Thank you Keldeo" said Damona.

Keldeo use's his power to change Damon into a Keldeo like him. But something went wrong. Damon first notice the changes.

He looks at his arms and notice it has been turn into sludge. Damon was surprise and see's his whole body was changing into sludge.

Damon tries to tell Keldeo. "Keldeo wait I think your doing it wrong" But Keldeo didn't listen as Damon continues to change as he shrank and his whole body was now a purple sludge.

Keldeo stop as Damon stops changing. He looks and see's a purple sludge where the young trainer use to be. Keldeo was surprise and goes to Damon.

"Damon? Are you okay? Are you in there?" The purple sludge then begins to reform itself into a pokemon that Damon turn into.

"I wasn't trying to change you into a Muk. I wanted to change you into a Keldeo, like me, then I'll have a friend to hang out with" said Keldeo.

"Well you didn't do a good job at it" said Damon. "I'm sorry Damon. I'm still new at this changing humans into pokemon. I guess I'm not ready" said Keldeo.

"I guess I can forgive you. But how am I going to change back now?" Damon ask. "Maybe Cobalion knows. But if I tell him. Then he'll know I change you into a pokemon and I can get into real trouble" said Keldeo.

"Well we better figure something out. I don't want to live the rest of my life as a Muk" said Damon. "Your right. Just give me some time. I'll think of something" said Keldeo.

112.content:
Somewhere on Legendary Island. The legendary Mew had came to the Island to play with some old friends of hers and new friends she want's to make.

As she looks around the Island. Mew spotted a human. It was Damon she saw. "A human on legendary Island. Hmm it's been a while since I play with a human. I wonder how much fun he'll be"

Mew giggles and hides in the bushes and waits for Damon to see her. Damon continues to look around the Island looking for any new pokemon and the person who send them the inventaion.

"This Island sure is big. It might take a whole day to search around the Island" as he continues to look around. Damon thought he heard a cute noise that's not far from him.

"Mew" was what Damon heard. "Huh? Is anyone there?" Damon ask. Mew then appears to Damon flying around him. Damon starts to look at Mew.

"Whoa a Mew and a cute one too" Mew stops flying around and talks with Damon telepathy. "Hello human. I see you arrive on the Island. Welcome to my home then" said Mew.

"This is your home?" Damon ask. "Not just my home. It's the home to many legendary pokemon. Would you like to play with me for a while?" Mew ask.

"Play with you? Are you serious?" Damon ask. "I am" Mew replied. Damon couldn't believe what he just heard. He never heard of a pokemon who want's to play with him. He decided to take up Mew's offer.

"Sure Mew I'll play with you" said Damon. "Horary but if were going to play. We need to make this far." Mew then use her psychic powers and lifts Damon up.

"Mew what are you doing?" Damon ask. "I'm going to change you into a pokemon. It's the only way you and I can play. Now what type should I change you into? Psychic, normal or another type? Hmm oh I know what to change you into"

She then begins to change Damon into a.

1151.content:
Entei had arrive on legendary Island along with his sister, Suicune, and younger brother, Raikou, as they split up to look around legendary Island.

The three legendary beast had a plan. They were going to change one human, boy or girl, into the type of their own. Entei will change a human into a fire type. Suicune will change a human into a water type and Raikou will change a human into an electric type. Once they find a human. They will meet up again and form a team.

"Now to find a human. I need to find a human with a pure heart. Someone who cares and loves pokemon" As Entei look around. He spotted Damon roaming around the Island. He can sense Damon's heart.

"This human's heart. It is pure. He's the one. Now to get his attention" Entei let's out a mighty roar. This got Damon's attention as he was startled by the sudden roar.

"What was that? A pokemon maybe? If it is. It sounds like a powerful one" Damon decided to check it out. Suddenly Entei jumps out surprising Damon as he was tackle to the ground. Entei lay his large paw on him.

"You, human, what is your name?" Entei ask. "D-Damon. Can you get your paw off me please? I'm having trouble breathing" Entei obeys and get's his paw off him. Damon catches his breath.

"I have sense your heart. It is a pure heart. Tell me Damon. Do you care and love pokemon?" Entei ask. Damon looks at Entei with a confuse look and gave him an answer.

"Yes I do care and love pokemon" said Damon. "I was hoping you would say that. Listen me, my brother and sister, Raikou and Suicune, are looking for humans to change into pokemon. I'm looking for a human with a pure heart and change him, or her, into a fire type and meet up with them so we can make a team of Fire, Water and Electric" said Entei.

"And you choose me?" Damon ask. Entei nodded. "Wow I can't believe this. A legendary pokemon asking me to become a fire type" said Damon. "Do you accept Damon?" Entei ask.

"How can I refuse something like that? Of course I accept your offer. But I don't know what to tell my friends about this" said Damon. "Don't worry about it. Suicune and Raikou might find them. We sense five humans here before heading to legendary Island" said Entei.

"But what about the other 2?" Damon ask. "We'll deal with them. Now are you ready?" Entei ask. "I am Entei. Please change me" Damon replied. "Very well then"

Entei then use his power and begins to change Damon. But into what?
1151.title: Entei's choosen human

choices: Suicune and Raikou comes back with humans of their own.

Damon continues to look through out the Island. Then he begins to feel funny. His mind was a little hazy. He begins to feel dizzy as Damon collapse on the ground.

He eventually woke up. He felt different. "What happen to me?" His vision was still blurry. But he did see someone. But he couldn't make out who it was.

"Oh good your awake Damon" Damon could almost recognize the voice. His vision clear up and he saw.
14531.title: Jirachi

145332.content: Do Jodi meets the legendary pokemon Latios?
145332.title: Latios?

1453321.content:
Jodi continues to walk around legendary Island. She was still disappointment that she couldn't go with Damon and tell him how she really felt for him.

"I want to tell Damon how I really feel. I want to tell him that I love him. But I feel nervous every time I do. If only there was a way I can tell Damon how I feel about him" said Jodi.

"Maybe I can help you" Jodi then heard a voice and looks around. "Who's there?" She ask. "You love this human boy right. Well your in luck. I can help you out"

Jodi was confuse. "That's nice and everything. But how are you going to help me if I can't see you" said Jodi. The mysterious pokemon then appears before Jodi.

It was a handsome strong looking Latios. The Latios smile. "I know how it feels that you love someone and you don't tell them how you feel. I'm in love with a beautiful Latias. But I never told her how I felt about her" said Latios.

"Your a Latios. How will you help me?" She ask. Latios then grabs Jodi's arms. "Just relax and let me do the rest" Latios then closes his eyes and transfer his power over to Jodi.

Jodi begins to feel different as her body changes. When it was done. Jodi became a beautiful attractive Latias. Latios opens his eyes and let's Jodi go.

Jodi looks over her body and was surprise. "I'm a Latias" said Jodi. "A beautiful Latias" said Latios. "But I didn't ask to become a pokemon" said Jodi.

"No but your heart did. You wanted to show Damon you love him. So your heart told me to show how beautiful you are. I only change people into a Latios, or Latias, if they need help with someone they love"

Jodi looks over her new body and admits she does look beautiful. "Do you think this will help me win Damon's heart?" She ask. "If it doesn't then I don't know what to do"

Jodi then thank Latios and left. "I bet Damon would look handsome as a Latios" She eventually found Damon sitting alone enjoying some lunch.

"He's alone. Perfect now's my chance" Jodi then goes behind Damon and plays peek a boo with him. "Hey who turn off the lights?" He ask. "Me silly"

She then uncovers Damon's eyes. Damon looks behind and see's Jodi as a beautiful Latias. "Whoa a Latias and a beautiful one as well" said Damon.

Jodi finds herself blushing. She then kiss Damon. This surprise him. "Oh wow. I didn't think I would get kiss from a legendary pokemon. Do you like me or something he ask?"

Jodi nods. "Wow I didn't think I find a pokemon that likes me" said Damon. "Hmm maybe he can't understand what I'm saying. Maybe I should change him into a Latios"

Jodi then grabs Damon's arms. "Um what are you doing Latias?" Jodi close her eyes and transfer her power over to Damon changing him in the process.
1453321.title: Latios

choices: Damon changes into another pokemon instead Latios.
14533212.content: After Jodi the Latias has kissing Damon to change him into a Latios as her power goes over to Damon. But something goes wrong, Damon feels the pain in his body and falls unconscious. Jodi looks at him with worry as she sees...
14533212.title: Something goes wrong.

145332122.content: Does Damon turn into a Latias?
145332122.title: Damon changes into another pokemon instead Latios.

1453321221.content:
When Jodi's kiss finish Damon's changes. Damon had become a Latias instead of a Latios. Jodi the Latias was surprise and goes to her future love.

"Oh no. This isn't what I wanted. Damon? Damon please wake up" Hearing Jodi's voice. Damon starts to wake and saw a beautiful Latias looking worried.

"Huh? Jodi is that you?" He ask. "Damon. Oh I'm so glad your okay" Jodi then hugs Damon. "Jodi what happen to you? Your a Latias" said Damon.

"Well it's a long story Damon. Plus your a Latias as well" Damon looks over her new body and was surprise that he, or she now, was indeed a Latias.

"I'm a Latias! How did this happen?" He ask. "I'm the one who change you" Damon looks at Jodi. "Your the one who change me?" He ask.

Jodi nods. "You were suppose to be change into a Latios. But instead you've became a Latias" Jodi then tells Damon everything that happen to her.

"Oh so that's what happen" said Damon. "I only did it cause I love you. I wanted to be with you forever. But now that your a Latias we can't"

Jodi then starts to cry. Damon feels bad for her and hugs her. "Hey it's okay Jodi. We'll think of something. I kind of like you too" said Damon.

Jodi starts to cheer up. "Really?" She ask. Damon nods. Jodi hugs back. "Thank you Damon" said Jodi. "Call me Damona. I am a female now" said Damona.

"Okay Damona" said Jodi. "Let's find our friends. We can figure this out later" said Damon. Jodi nods and the two friends went to find their friends.
1453321221.title: Damona the Latias
